game.name: Space Fighter
game.description:
Many of you have been passionate for playing the role of a space fighter. However, only a few individuals can get a chance to make their dream come true. We have brought a brand new adventure game to especially those who want to drive spaceship in their own style. The realistic graphics and seamless gameplay make you realize as you are driving a real spaceship in the life-like space environment. Are you ready to enjoy this great fun? Join Space Fighter game and get ready to play best war game online!
In this free online space games, you will be allowed to push yourself to the absolute maximum thrill. All you need to do is behave politely without worrying about holding back. There are several tricks twists and obstacles that come on your way. However, practicing it for several times will help get through all the hurdles and clear all levels in a smart way. Get ready to shave precious milliseconds off, speed past more of your rivals and climb to higher speeds!
This heart-pounding action is not going to get you bored for a single minute. Take your seat on the spaceship and be prepared to drive it through an anti-gravity suspended asteroid field! Do not show pity on your enemies and try to destroy them as fast as you can! Coordinate your team, perform well and score some points to unlock the useful upgrades that will help to improve the efficiency of your spaceship later! Grab your keyboard & mouse to play best spaceship game online on atmegame.com, where no install required!
